duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the growth of Sentry by providing a next-generation customer success motion that maximizes customer value from the Sentry platform.
Maintain long-term account health and strong relationships by providing continued value and support to existing customers.
Collaborate with internal teams to execute Executive Business Reviews, build detailed Strategic Customer Success Plans, and establish critical goals for expansion.
Advocate customer product needs, feedback, and issues cross-departmentally, and program-manage customer expectations.
Craft innovative, successful, repeatable strategies to expand the reach within the portfolio and navigate complex Org mapping to identify and target engineering teams not using the product.

Consistently meet and exceed ARR targets for Renewals and Expansions as a Pod, and perform internal quarterly Strategic Business Reviews to outline the health of the portfolio and present Strategic Success Plans with the Executive team.
Help customers make the best out of their investment with Sentry by driving product adoption, sharing best practices, and implementing growth and optimization strategies for maximum value.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent and a dedication to ongoing learning
